data.name: DIC_ERROR_OLDERVERSION_MAININSTRUCTION
data.value: You are trying to open an old Learning Module file format. Do you want to continue?

data.name: REG_LATER_TEXT
data.value: You may register later through our registration option in the "Help" menu.

data.name: MAINFORM_STICKREMOVED_CLOSEDIC
data.value: Close Learning Module without saving You will lose your progress and changes from this session.

data.name: UNPACK_DICTIONARY_EXISTS_MBX_TEXT
data.value: The Learning Module already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?

data.name: DEMOTE_CONF_TEXT
data.comment: Card is demoted to the previous box

data.name: TOOLTIP_SELF_ASSESSEMENT_YES
data.comment: promote means to put card to the next box

data.name: MAINFORM_SLIDESHOW_LBLQUESTION_TEXT
data.comment: {0} = Title Question eg: "Slideshow mode - state/capital", "Slideshow mode - Image"

data.name: SAVE_REQUEST_TEXT
data.value: Do you want to save the Learning Module?

data.name: CONVERT_REQUEST_TEXT
data.value: This learning module is in an old format and needs to be converted. Do you want to proceed?

data.name: IMPORT_FILETYPE
data.comment: Dialog to open a File. This is the filter for file types. eg Comma seperated values (*.csv) All Files (*.*)

data.name: SELF_ASSESSEMENT_LBLCHAPTER_TEXT
data.value: Did you know it? (Use the up/down arrow keys or click the "Do know/Don't know" buttons)
data.comment: "Do know/Don't know" cross-references to buttons in interface

data.name: COPY_MEDIA_TEXT
data.value:
The media file will be copied to the media folder of the Learning Module. If you make any changes to the media, remember to update it there as well.
Show this information again?

data.name: CONVERT_DIRDIALOG_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Select a target folder for the converted Learning Module.

data.name: PACK_DIRDIALOG_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Select a folder for the unpacked Learning Module.

data.name: DIC_ERROR_OLDERVERSION_FOOTER
data.value: Make a backup copy of the Learning Module before opening it.

data.name: TOOLTIP_SELF_ASSESSEMENT_DONTASK
data.value: Don't Ask Card Again, Card is restorable in "Cards - Maintain"

data.name: DIC_IMPORT_SUCCESSFUL_TEXT
data.value: Old Learning Module file {0}.odf successfully imported and saved as {1}.

data.name: NO_CARDS_TEXT
data.value: There are no cards in this Learning Module. Add some cards.

data.name: PERSONAL_FOLDER_2_TEXT
data.value: The default Learning Modules Folder is not specified, the folder of the last opened Learning Module will be used.

data.name: MAINFORM_STICKREMOVED_DESCRIPTION
data.value:
{0}
If you would like your progress and changes to be saved, insert the stick again and wait until this window closes.

data.name: IMPORT_END_OF_FILE_TEXT
data.value: Not enough lines found in source file.

data.name: SOUND_SIMPLE_RECORD_STOP_TEXT
data.value: Recording stops as soon as you click [OK]. Then the sound will be played.

data.name: PERSONAL_FOLDER_TEXT
data.value: Specify a personal folder for Learning Modules.

data.name: TOOLTIP_NEWDICT_ESOUNDDIR
data.value: Directory Where Recorded Sounds Should Be Saved

data.name: UNPACK_DICTIONARY_FOLDER_EXISTS_MBX_TEXT
data.value: A Learning Module already exists in this folder!

data.name: DIC_DIR_MISSING_TEXT
data.value: Use 'Tools -> Specify Learning Module Folder' to select a folder.

data.name: MAINFORM_SLIDESHOW_MODE_TEXT
data.comment: Image, Sound, Image (not available), Sound (not available) follows here

data.name: DIC_ERROR_OLDERVERSION_CONTENT
data.value: You tried to open a Learning Module which was created with an older version of MemoryLifter, opening it in this version may lead to incompatibilities with earlier MemoryLifter versions.

data.name: UNPACK_DICTIONARY_FOLDER_EXISTS_MBX_CONTENT
data.value: MemoryLifter found an existing version of this Learning Module in this folder. If you continue existing files may be replaced. This could lead to conflicting media file and resource references. Do you still want to proceed?

data.name: DIC_ERROR_CREATENEW_TEXT
data.value: Unable to create new Learning Module.

data.name: RESTART_WARNING_TEXT
data.value: This will reset your learning progress by deleting the contents of all boxes! Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: CONVERT_DICTIONARY_FOLDER_EXISTS_MBX_TEXT
data.value: A Learning Module already exists in this folder!

data.name: PRINT_SELECTED
data.comment: {0} = Amount of selected cards, {1} = Total amount of cards

data.name: COMMON_NUMBER_FORMAT
data.comment: Format of a number with decimals

data.name: NO_WORDS_TEXT
data.value: No more cards left to ask! Use "Select Chapters..." in the "Learn" menu.
data.comment: "Learn", "Specify Chapters to learn" = Cross-References to menu

data.name: IMPORTER_MEDIA_WARNING_TEXT
data.value: Where can the media files be found?

data.name: NO_CHAPTERS_TEXT
data.value: No chapter information available. Add chapters before adding cards!

data.name: EXPORT_FILETYPE
data.comment: Dialog to open a File. This is the filter for file types. eg Comma seperated values (*.csv) All Files (*.*)

data.name: ABOUT_HTML_DISCLAIMER_TEXT
data.value: This software is provided "as is", the authors shall in no way be held liable for any damage resulting from the direct or indirect use, or misuse of this software.

data.name: REG_DONE_TEXT
data.value: You are already registered. Do you want to register as a different user?

data.name: REGISTRY_ERROR_2_TEXT
data.value:
Unable to write to the Windows Registry.
Please contact the MemoryLifter Support at http://www.memorylifter.com
data.comment: Do not translate the word MemoryLifter

data.name: TOOLTIP_SELF_ASSESSEMENT_NO
data.comment: demote means to put card to the previous box

data.name: DIC_ERROR_OLDERVERSION_PROCEED
data.value: Convert and open This will convert the file to the new format.

data.name: MAINTAIN_SELECTEDCARD
data.comment: Used for 1 card, see also MAINTAIN_SELECTEDCARDS

data.name: DIC_ERROR_OLDERVERSION_CANCEL
data.value: Do not open This will leave the file as it is.

data.name: DIC_MODIFIED_TEXT
data.value:
{0} has been modified outside of the program. It is possible the Learning Module is being used by someone else right now. Saving might lead to conflicts! Click
* [Yes] to overwrite file * [No] to save your progress to another file * [Cancel] to interrupt process.

data.name: BAD_FILENAME_CAPTION
data.value: Error Adding File to Media Folder

data.name: MAINFORM_STICKREMOVED_MAININSTRUCTION
data.value: You removed the memory stick while the following Learning Module was still open.

data.name: MANAGECHAPTER_LAST_CHAPTER_MESSAGE_TEXT
data.value: This chapter cannot be deleted because it is the last remaining chapter.

data.name: DIC_MEDIA_ERROR_TEXT
data.value: The media directory could not be saved properly. Please check that it is valid.

data.name: STYLESHEET_CODE_ERROR_TEXT

data.name: DIR_NOT_FOUND_TEXT
data.value: The Learning Module does not exist or the path is invalid.

data.name: TOOLTIP_FRMCARD_CHARACTER
data.comment: Map with Special Characters eg Ñ

data.name: INITIALIZE_ENVIRONMENT_ERROR_TEXT
data.value: An error occurred while setting up the user environment. Check the Learning Module folder.

data.name: CONVERT_DICTIONARY_EXISTS_MBX_TEXT
data.value: The Learning Module already exists. Do you want to replace it?

data.name: CONVERT_DICTIONARY_EXISTS_MBX_CONTENT
data.value: MemoryLifter found an existing copy of this Learning Module in the folder. If you continue all existing files will be replaced.

data.name: UNPACK_DICTIONARY_EXISTS_MBX_CONTENT
data.value: MemoryLifter found an existing copy of this Learning Module in the folder. If you continue all existing files will be replaced.

data.name: CONVERT_DICTIONARY_FOLDER_EXISTS_MBX_CONTENT
data.value: MemoryLifter found an existing Learning Module in this folder. If you continue, existing files may be replaced. This could lead to conflicting media file and resource references. Do you still want to proceed?

data.name: POOL_EMPTY_TEXT
data.value: The pool of cards is empty. Select addtional chapters to learn or add new cards to any of the selected chapters.
data.comment: "Specify Capter to Learn", "Learn" = cross-references to menu

data.value: Delete chapter and all cards in it?

data.name: CONVERT_DICTIONARY_EXISTS_MBX_OPTION_NO
data.value: No, do not overwrite the Learning Module.

data.value: File could not be opened. Please retry.

data.name: IMPORT_HEADERLINE_ERROR_TEXT
data.value: No header line found in the first eight rows.

Unable to open the Windows Registry.

data.name: MSGBOX_LABEL_NEWDICT_REQUIRED_FIELDS_EMPTY
data.value: Question and answer fields must not be empty!

data.name: BAD_FILENAME_TEXT
data.value: Filename already exists - Rename your file.

data.name: DIC_DAMAGED_TEXT
data.value: Some parts of your Learning Module may be damaged, if there are further error messages after this one, please contact the MemoryLifter Support at http://www.memorylifter.com
data.comment: Do not translate the word MemoryLifter

data.name: SOUND_ERROR_TEXT
data.value: Unable to play sound. Missing file {0}

data.name: UNPACK_NOT_ORIGINAL_TEXT
data.value: The file is not an original MemoryLifter Learning Module. Continue anyway?

data.name: SETUPBOXES_BOXLABEL0_TEXT
data.comment: Pool contains all cards from all boxes

data.name: PRINT_BOX_TOOLTIP
data.comment: {0} = amount of cards in the current box

data.name: PRINT_SELECT_TEXT
data.value: You have to select at least one chapter and one box for printing.

data.name: HINT_TEXT2
data.value: Sorry, card was demoted to box one.

data.name: SOUND_SIMPLE_RECORD_START_TEXT
data.value: Recording starts as soon as you click [OK].

data.name: TIMESTAMPS_TEXT
data.value: The timestamps in the Learning Module are more recent than your system time. Please check your system time, MemoryLifter will continue working with relative timestamps until the problem is solved.

data.name: DIC_NOT_SUPPORTED_TEXT
data.value: Learning Module file is too old. This version is not fully supported and may contain errors.

data.name: EDIT_FIELD_FLY_TEXT
data.value: This is a special input field that only allows typing correct characters. You can NOT delete, backspace, cut, paste, or change lines in this field. If you prefer standard input mode, go to "Learn – Learning Options", and uncheck "Correct on the fly".
data.comment: Tools - Option = Cross-Reference to menu, "Correct on the fly" = Reference to interface

data.name: DIC_INVALID_FORMAT_TEXT
data.value: The format of file {0} is invalid or too old.

data.name: COPY_MEDIA_CAPTION
data.value: Copy Media Files to Media Folder

data.name: DIP_NOT_SUPPORTED_TEXT
data.value: Packed Learning Modules with extension .dip are not supported by this version of MemoryLifter. Use .dzp or .zip files or contact MemoryLifter Support (support@memorylifter.com) for help.
data.comment: Do not translate the word MemoryLifter

data.name: RECORD_LWORD_TEXT
data.value: Please select the fields for recording below and start recording. You can also record a single file by pressing the record button.

data.name: STATISTICS_OTHER_TAB_BOX_SIZE_STRING
data.comment: {0} = box number, {1} = number of cards in it

data.name: HINT_TEXT1
data.value: Awesome! Card has been promoted to the next box!

data.name: MAIN_LOADREG_TEXT
data.value: Would you like to load the previous settings from V2.0?

data.name: MAINFORM_LBLBOXNO_TEXT
data.comment: Pool contains all cards from all boxes

data.name: DIC_NOT_VALID_TEXT
data.value: {0} is not a valid MemoryLifter Learning Module file.
data.comment: {0} = name of Learning Module. Do not translate the word MemoryLifter

data.name: MAINTAIN_SELECTEDCARDS
data.comment: {0} = number of cards, see also MAINTAIN_SELECTEDCARD

data.name: IMPORT_FILE_IN_USE_TEXT
data.value: This file is being used by another program. Close this program and try again.

data.name: DIC_ERROR_NEWERVERSION_TEXT
data.value: You tried to open a Learning Module which has been created with a newer version of MemoryLifter. Please visit the MemoryLifter Website to download the latest version.

data.name: STYLESHEET_NOT_AVAILABLE_TEXT
data.value: Current Stylesheet is unavailable. Uncheck the option "Use Learning Module Style" or contact the MemoryLifter Support at http://www.memorylifter.com

data.name: MAINFORM_LBLANSWER_MULTI_TEXT

data.comment: Synonym delimiter when printing out synonyms

data.name: POOL_EMPTY_CAPTION
data.comment: Pool contains all cards from all boxes

data.value: You had a few typing mistakes. Still count the word as correct?

data.value: This learning module contains only one chapter which has been selected for learning automatically!

data.value: This card is highlighted because it was created with the last import.

data.name: UNPACK_NOT_ORIGINAL_CONTENT
data.value: You tried to open a packed file which was not created for MemoryLifter.

data.name: MAINTAIN_DELETE_WARNING
data.value: Warning, this action cannot be undone!

data.value: You have selected {0} card(s) for deletion.

data.name: CONVERT_REQUEST_CONTENT
data.value: This Learning Module has been created with a previous version of MemoryLifter. MemoryLifter needs to convert it to the new format in order to use it. Do you want to proceed?

data.value: This will delete the chapter '{0}' and the {1} card(s) in it.

data.value: Warning, this action cannot be undone!

data.value: Import using import file path. {0}.|Import using Learning Module path. {1}.|Cancel Import.

data.value: You chose to import media files. Please specify the folder in which they can be found.

data.name: PACK_IOEXCEPTION_TEXT
data.value: Unable to open file for writing! The file may be in use or write-protected.

data.name: IMPORT_FAILURE_TEXT
data.value: MemoryLifter failed to import your cards.

data.name: INITIALIZE_SETTINGS_ERROR
data.value: Settings updated, please restart the program...

data.name: AUDIOPLAYER_CRASHED_TEXT
data.value: Due to an error with the audio player, sound has been disabled. Restart MemoryLifter to enable sound.

data.name: MANAGECHAPTER_EMPTY_TITLE
data.value: The chapter title must not be empty!

data.name: DIC_ERROR_LOADING_LOCKED_TEXT
data.value: Error loading Learning Module {0}. The file may be in use by another application. Please close it and try again.

data.name: EXPORTER_COPY_MEDIA_COMMANDS
data.value: Yes, export media files. |No, do not export media files.

data.name: EXPORTER_COPY_MEDIA_CONTENT
data.value: In order to export media files, MemoryLifter must copy the files to the export folder. This can take some time. Do you still wish to export media files?

data.name: EXPORTER_COPY_MEDIA_TEXT
data.value: Do you want do export media files?

data.name: DIC_ERROR_NOT_DECRYPTED_TEXT
data.value: You tried to open a Learning Module which requires the memory stick it came with. Please insert the original memory stick and open it from there.

data.name: SESSION_INVALID_DETAIL
data.value: Your Memorylifter Session was closed by another user logging in with the same credentials.

data.name: SESSION_INVALID_MAIN
data.value: Your session was closed by another user!

data.name: NEW_DIC_NO_CONNECTION_TEXT
data.value: There is no connection available to store a new Learning Module!

data.name: DRAG_COPY_ERROR_MAININTRODUCTION
data.value: Error while copying your Learning Module

data.name: DRAG_FILE_EXISTS_CONTENT
data.value: There is already a Learning Module with the same name in the default Learning Module folder. You can either delete the Learning Module from the default folder or rename one of them.

data.name: DRAG_MOVE_ERROR_MAININTRODUCTION
data.value: Error while moving your Learning Module

data.name: DRAG_NO_DEFAULT_CONNECTION_AVAILABLE_CONTENT
data.value: There is no Learning Module Folder set, MemoryLifter cannot copy the Learning Module without a default folder.

data.name: DRAG_NO_DEFAULT_CONNECTION_AVAILABLE_MAININTRODUCTION
data.value: No default Learning Module folder available.

data.name: DRAG_DIALOG_BUTTONS
data.value: Copy the Learning Module Copies the Learning Module into the default Learning Module folder.|Move the Learning Module Moves the Learning Module into the default Learning Module folder.|Just learn it Opens the Learning Module for learning without copying or moving it.|Cancel Do nothing at all.

data.name: DRAG_DIALOG_MAININTRODUCTION
data.value: What do you want to do with this Learning Module?

data.name: DRAG_LM_EXISTS_DIALOG_BUTTONS
data.value: Replace Learning Module A Learning Module with the same name already exists in the default Learning Module folder. This will replace it.|Just learn it Opens the Learning Module without copying or moving it.|Cancel Do nothing at all.

data.name: DRAG_LM_EXISTS_DIALOG_MAININTRODUCTION
data.value: What do you want to do with this Learning Module?

data.name: DRAG_CFG_GENERAL_ERROR_MAININSTRUCTION
data.value: Error loading the MemoryLifter configuration file.

data.name: DRAG_CFG_SUCCESS_MAIN
data.value: Import of the MemoryLifter configuration file was successful.

data.name: DRAG_INVALID_CFG_FILE_CONTENT
data.value: The MemoryLifter configuration file was invalid. Please contact your system administator.

data.name: DRAG_CFG_DIALOG_BUTTONS
data.value: Import Add this MemoryLifter configuration file to the current configuration.|Cancel Do nothing at all.

data.name: DRAG_CFG_DIALOG_CONTENT
data.value: This MemoryLifter configuration file will extend the available connections on the startpage.

data.name: DRAG_CFG_DIALOG_MAIN
data.value: Do you want to import this MemoryLifter configuration file?

data.name: SYNCHRONIZATION_FAILED_CONTENT
data.value: Your changes will be uploaded to the server the next time you open this Learning Module.

data.name: SYNCHRONIZATION_SYNC_FAILED_MAIN
data.value: Failed to upload changes to the server.

data.name: MAINFORM_CREATE_BACKUP_DIALOG_BUTTONS
data.value: Proceed Continue to create backup.|Cancel Cancel create backup operation.

data.name: MAINFORM_CREATE_BACKUP_DIALOG_MAIN
data.value: Note: In order to copy the learning module it must be closed and reopened. Continue?

data.name: DBVERSION_NOT_SUPPORTED_CONTENT
data.value: MemoryLifter will try to update your Learning Module now. If you do not want to update or you want to create a backup first, hit cancel and reopen the file later.

data.name: DBVERSION_NOT_SUPPORTED_MAIN
data.value: The database version of your Learning Module is not supported.

data.name: DBVERSION_NOT_SUPPORTED_UPGRADE_FAILED_CONTENT
data.value: Contact your system administrator or the MemoryLifter support team.

data.name: DBVERSION_NOT_SUPPORTED_UPGRADE_FAILED_MAIN
data.value: MemoryLifter failed to update your Learning Module.

data.name: TASK_DIALOG_DISK_FULL_TEXT
data.value: The disk you are trying to learn from is full. Please free some space and try again.

data.name: LEARNING_WINDOW_SERVER_OFFLINE_DIALOG_CONTENT
data.value: Your learning success up to now has been saved.

data.name: LEARNING_WINDOW_SERVER_OFFLINE_DIALOG_MAIN
data.value: MemoryLifter needs to close this learning session.

data.name: DIC_LOADING_ERROR_OFFLINE
data.value: The server, where the selected learning module is stored on is not reachable.

data.name: MAINFORM_ACTIVATION_SERVICE_OFFLINE_CONTENT
data.value: If you have a firewall which is causing the connection attempt to fail, allow MemoryLifter access through the firewall.

data.name: MAINFORM_ACTIVATION_SERVICE_OFFLINE_MAIN
data.value: The Online Activation Service is unavailable. Please check your network connectivity or try again to activate this Learning Module on a PC with internet access.

data.name: TEACHER_DEFAULT
data.comment: Describes a set of preset learning settings.

data.name: TEACHER_NICEGUY
data.comment: Describes a set of preset learning settings.

data.name: TEACHER_OCCASIONAL
data.comment: Describes a set of preset learning settings.

data.name: TEACHER_STRICT
data.comment: Describes a set of preset learning settings.

data.name: EXTENSION_INFORMUSER_MESSAGE_SELECTED
data.value: The {0} extension '{1}' was installed and selected.

data.name: TASK_DIALOG_IncompatibleDatabaseVersion_Caption
data.value: The selected Database has an incompatible Version!

data.name: TASK_DIALOG_IncompatibleDatabaseVersion_Text
data.value: Please contact your Administrator to update your Database Version.

data.name: TASK_DIALOG_MemoryLifterTooOld_Caption
data.value: Your MemoryLifter version is too old!

data.name: TASK_DIALOG_MemoryLifterTooOld_Text
data.value: Please go to www.memorylifter.com and update your version of MemoryLifter.

data.name: ERROR_LAUNCH_EXTERNAL_APPLICATION_TEXT
data.value: MemoryLifter failed to launch an external application.

data.name: TASK_DIALOG_NoNewVersionFound_Text
data.value: Please search again in some days or enable the automatic search to let MemoryLifter search for Updates on every startup of MemoryLifter.

data.name: TASK_DIALOG_LEARNING_MODULE_PROTECTED_CAPTION
data.value: The selected learning module is protected!

data.name: TASK_DIALOG_LEARNING_MODULE_PROTECTED_TEXT
data.value: This Learning Module was purchased prior to the open source release of MemoryLifter and is protected by proprietary protection technology. This functionality could not be integrated into the current version of MemoryLifter because of license restrictions. Please use MemoryLifter 2.3 to open this Learning Module.

data.name: DRAG_CFG_SUCCESS_MAIN_NOTHING_IMPORTED_DETAIL
data.value: Either there were no connections in the file or they have been imported already.
